function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interactions between children aged 5 to 18 and the local population can lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential for the spread of infectious illnesses within the local population and visiting families.","Mitigation":"Implement stringent health and safety protocols, including regular health screenings and promoting vaccination among the local population and visiting families.","Technologies":"Health monitoring and screening technologies, vaccination tracking systems, and communication platforms for promoting health protocols.","People":"Local population, visiting families with children aged 5 to 18.","Owner":"Local health authorities, hospitality management, and visiting families."},{"Description":"Lack of flexibility in HR organization in the 'New Normal' can lead to challenges in implementing health and safety protocols for employees and visitors.","Impact":"Increased risk of employee and guest exposure to contagious diseases, leading to potential outbreaks and negative reputation for the business.","Mitigation":"Restructure HR policies to allow for flexibility in scheduling, remote work, and paid sick leave. Provide comprehensive health and safety training for employees.","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, health monitoring apps, and communication tools for employee training and coordination.","People":"Employees, guests, management.","Owner":"HR department, management, and local health authorities."}]}
